comment.message:
I hope you enjoy my project. It can be taken as a portfolio.
I have many ideas of what I want to add here.

About.title: About me
About.greeting: Howdy. Thank you for visiting my web site.
About.paragraph1:
My nickname is Pidtchay, I am a web developer.
At the beginning of my career, I participated in the development of terminal applications. The last few years I have been doing web development.
About.paragraph2:
I started this project to help myself in consolidating my knowledge. And acquire new knowledge.
This will help me do my job better. I hope you will also benefit from my knowledge.
